room_title: Escape room "Monologue Murder" by Escape This Live: Columbus in Columbus (GA)
room_description:
In hopes of renovating ASAP, a group of attorneys has run into a small problem named Madeline Blaire. She was an actress at the Springer Opera House in the late 1800's. When a love affair went sour, she was murdered in her dressing room, which happens to be the office Attorney Mike Sloan is hoping to put his nameplate on.
Since that dreadfully sad day, Madeline has haunted the corner room of 1036 1st Avenue and because of her presence, nobody has been able to disturb the old dressing room. The realtor has hired you, the top paranormal experts in the nation to take care of this ghost problem before it destroys the deal. They're a little skeptical of your talents and have only agreed to pay you if you can take care of things within one hour. Can you help the ghost of Madeline Blaire pass on to the other side?
